word:
God has endowed many of our youth with superior capabilities; but too often they have enervated their powers, confused and enfeebled their minds, so that for years they have made no growth in grace or in a knowledge of the reasons of our faith, because of their unwise choice of reading. Those who are looking for the Lord soon to come, looking 
                                                                           273
for that wondrous change, when "this corruptible shall put on incorruption," should in this probationary time be standing upon a higher plane of action.
